meanings.definition: The practice or skill of making cabinets.
meanings.sent1: His cabinetmakings were admired by all in the town.
meanings.sent2: She learned cabinetmakings from her grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The cabinetmakings of the clumsy apprentice often led to crooked doors.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in cabinetmakings was like a master painter's brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: The art of cabinetmakings requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The products or goods produced by cabinetmaking.
meanings.sent1: The shop displayed beautiful cabinetmakings in the window.
meanings.sent2: Customers admired the fine details of his cabinetmakings.
meanings.sent3: The cabinetmakings in the store were selling fast due to their quality.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of cabinetmakings was like a gallery of woodworking art.
meanings.sent5: The cabinetmakings showcased the craftsman's dedication to his work.
